hasAttributes.name: BookingId
hasAttributes.description: Unique identifier either coming from previous system otherwise it needs to be defined

hasAttributes.name: BookingDate
hasAttributes.description: Date booking was created in yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ssZ form (conform to ISO 8061)

hasAttributes.name: CheckInTime
hasAttributes.description: Check in time yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ssZ form (conform to ISO 8061)

hasAttributes.name: CheckOutTime
hasAttributes.description: Check out time yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ssZ form (conform to ISO 8061)
